channel.title: Add Attribute To Hold Name of Application That Created XML File
channel.description: This [issue](http://support.iatistandard.org/hc/en-us/articles/214388566-Add-Attribute-To-Hold-Name-of-Application-That-Created-XML-File) was originally added and originally discussed on the previous version IATI Standard Upgrade forum. However that forum has now itself moved to the IATI Discuss platform so this topic has been created in order that discussions can continue here.

item.title: Add Attribute To Hold Name of Application That Created XML File
item.dc:creator: stevieflow
item.description:
I’d just like to flag that we do have an existing metadata schema (iati-registry-record-schema.xsd) within the standard

This isn’t widely adopted, but worth noting it is within our infrastructure

Read full topic
item.source: Add Attribute To Hold Name of Application That Created XML File
